caption.center: JOHN MALLOY, d/b/a THE DOGWOOD GUN CLUB v. ROY A. COOPER, III, Attorney
General for the State of North Carolina; DAVID R. WATERS, District
Attorney For the 9th Prosecutorial District; DAVID S. SMITH, Sheriff of
Granville County; STATE OF NORTH CAROLINA.

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th day of March 2004 by Attorney General in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:
Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of May 2004.
